titleStmt.title: The life and death of the famous Thomas Stukely An English gentleman in the time of Queen Elizabeth, who ended his life in the baetle of the three kings of Barbary.
Life and death of famous Thomas Stukely
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold in Bow-Church-Yard, London,

notesStmt.note: In four columns with the title and woodcut above the first two; the columns are not separated by rules.
Place and date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
